name: Looty
description:
Loot the booty.. Arrr! Just a simple pirate cat themed coin clicker.  Made for Global Game Jam 2021.

CONTROLS: 

  • WASD for movement 
  • SPACE to loot a chest, box, or safe 
  • MOUSE to move cat paw 
  • MOUSE CLICK 1 to pickup parchment 
  • R to reset game
  •  ESCAPE to exit game

TEAM:

  • AIM DIAB - Art
  • GLENN MACDONALD - Programming
  • MICHAEL MARNEY BRUSSTAR - Music / Sound Design
  • RYAN MCCONNELL - Art
  • CARL DAVIS  - Programming
